info.name: QQ - Flexile Dark - Fixes
info.description: Just some fixes for the Flexile Dark style on QQ. If you see any errors contact me on SB or QQ if you can, it'll probably get notices faster there. [DISCONTINUED]
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.1.1 - Added !important to some lines that weren't working. Version 1.1.0 - Removed the extra stuff that weren't fixes. Version 1.0.0 - Added to Userstyles.
